sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD_01 ,A.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_NM AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_NM_01 ,A.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_CD AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD_02 ,A.DS_SVC_CALL_TP_NM AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_NM_02 FROM DS_SVC_CALL_TP A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' UNION ALL SELECT A.SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD_01 ,A.SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_NM AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_NM_01 ,A.SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD_02 ,A.SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_NM AS SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_NM_02 FROM SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.SVC_ITRPT_FLG = 'Y' AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SVC_SUPPL_TASK_TP_CD_01
